Name: CafâˆšÂ© Karpershoek
Review Text:
My fiance and I have a habit of going in every city we visit in the oldest CafÃ©. This is it. This is the oldest in Amsterdam.
Coffee tastes good, serving is quick. Would return.
Bonus: it looks nice with Christmas decorations.

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Karpershoek

I sat there for 3 hours so it can't be that bad

Name: CafâˆšÂ© Karpershoek
